en.description: On swapping to Secondary Weapon, consume all Combo Multipliers to increase Secondary Weapon Critical Chance by 12% per Combo consumed for 15s.

ru.description: При переключении на вторичное оружие расходует все множители комбо, чтобы увеличить шанс крит. урона вторичного оружия на 12% за каждое израсходованное комбо в течение 15 с.

ko.description: 보조 무기로 교체할 시, 모든 연속기 배수를 소모하여 15초 간 소모된 연속기 배수 당 12%의 보조 무기 치명타 확률을 부여합니다.

de.description: On swapping to Secondary Weapon, consume all Combo Multipliers to increase Secondary Weapon Critical Chance by 12% per Combo consumed for 15s.

fr.description: Lors du passage à l'arme Secondaire, consommez tous les Multiplicateurs de Combo pour augmenter les Chances de Critique d'arme Secondaire de 12% par Combo consommé pendant 15s.

pt.description: Ao trocar para a Arma Secundária, durante 15s, consumirá todos os Multiplicadores de Combo para aumentar a Chance Crítica de Armas Secundárias em 12% conforme o Combo consumido.

zh-hans.description: 切换到次要武器时消耗所有连击倍率，每层消耗的倍率增加 12% 的次要武器暴击几率，持续 15 秒。

zh-hant.description: On swapping to Secondary Weapon, consume all Combo Multipliers to increase Secondary Weapon Critical Chance by 12% per Combo consumed for 15s.

es.description: Al cambiar a arma secundaria, consume todos los multiplicadores de combo para aumentar la probabilidad crítica del arma secundaria en un 12 % por combo consumido durante 15s.

it.description: Passando all'Arma Secondaria, consuma tutti i Moltiplicatori Combo per aumentare la Probabilità Critico dell'Arma Secondaria del 12% per ogni Combo consumata per 15s.

pl.description: Po wyjęciu Broni Bocznej zużywa całe Kombo i zwiększa szansę Obr. kryt. Broni bocznej o 12% za każde Kombo na 15 s.

uk.description: On swapping to Secondary Weapon, consume all Combo Multipliers to increase Secondary Weapon Critical Chance by 12% per Combo consumed for 15s.
